title: Best Web Competition 2021: SLAF clinch Silver Award
content: The Sri Lanka Air Force official website, www.airforce.lk won the Silver Award under the government category in the Best Web Competition 2021 which was organised by the RK Domain Registry for the 11th time to recognise the best websites in Sri Lanka.The Award was handed over on 25 February to the Commander of the Air Force, Air Marshal Sudarshana Pathirana by the Director of Information Technology, Air Commodore Arosha Vithana. Members of the SLAF Web Development Team, Flight Lieutenant HGL Pushpakumara and Flight Lieutenant PATP Jayasinghe from the No 1 Information Technology Wing at SLAF Base Ratmalana attended the event.
